en: Don't forget the G36 at the ammunation store!
Come on man! take yourself an M16!
Daddy, will you get me a G36 as a birthday present...
I want you to by me a colossal and shinny M16.
Leave right now and never come back unless you bring back an M16 with you.
Take few G36 with you, just in case...
Tell mom not to forget the M16 at the local hillbilly market!
